links.title: Tomorrow is When The Balance Of Power May Shift For The Stock Market
links.description: It was another exciting day in the stock market, but today was different. It was the S&P 500 and the Dow that lead the market lower not the NASDAQ! Interesting to say the least. Does it mean something? I do. I think it is a sign that perhaps the tides may be turning.
